attributes.action: Re-open Greenham Common as a Civil Airfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to reopen Greenham Common as a Civil Airfield. The Airfield has a lot of history as it is a former WW2 Airfield and a NATO Cold War Airfield. It would be very popular with aviation enthisiasts and also a boost to the local ara and economy to see flying return to Greenham Common in Berkshire. Also, because it is near to Newbury it will be very close to popular events like the horse racing
